name: WebsiteStatus
0:
”Alexa, Start Website Status”
”Alexa, Website Status”
”Alexa, Open Website Status”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: website status
des:
This skill checks if the website or webserver is still up and running. 
You can say "website status" to start the skill. 
Once the skill is started you will listen to a welcome message.
After the welcome message it will ask for the name of the website and then its extension.

It may take some tries due to the pronunciation of website name or even spelling out the name of the website. 
Please avoid using domains having special characters like hyphen, underscore, etc.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
